planned.title: My Reviews Dashboard Page
planned.description: A dedicated page in the user dashboard listing all reviews the user has written, with inline edit and delete actions.

planned.title: Product Search with URL Params
planned.description: Full search page with real URL query params (?q=...) so results are shareable and browser-navigable. Highlights matched text in results.

planned.title: Tag / Category Filtering
planned.description: Filter the product listing page by tag (vscode, nextjs, python). Tags are clickable pills on product cards and on the listing header.

planned.title: Related Products Section
planned.description: Show 3 suggested products at the bottom of each product detail page, filtered by same category/tags.

planned.title: Review Pagination
planned.description: Show first 5 reviews with a 'Load more' button instead of listing all. Improves performance on products with many reviews.

planned.title: Avatar Upload
planned.description: Allow users to upload a custom profile picture from the profile settings page. Store in cloud storage (e.g. Cloudinary or S3).

planned.title: Dynamic OG Image per Product
planned.description: Generate Open Graph images on the fly per product using @vercel/og so social shares show the product name, rating, and icon.

planned.title: PWA Support
planned.description: Add web app manifest and service worker so dotsuite is installable as a PWA with basic offline support.

notes: Items 1–5 are the core release, items 6–8 are stretch goals
All new pages must be fully localized (EN, AR, FR, DE, RU)
All new pages must have a loading skeleton component
No hardcoded colors — use CSS variables from globals.css
